name: Find the Carrier
description:
FIND THE CARRIER

Find the virus carrier before it's too late!

The game was made in an attempt to simulate the spread of coronavirus (covid-19) by one person. Development started on March 11, 2020 when WHO characterized covid-19 as a pandemic. 

If you enjoyed the game and would like to try additional exciting levels, please leave a comment here or on my YouTube channel!
